mapper.select: select fProductName as 'productName' ,fUuid as 'uuid' from t_product_info where fProductName=#{name} ;
select fUuid as 'uuid' ,fProductName as 'productName' ,fProductPrice as 'productPrice' ,fCreateDate as 'createDate' ,fAlterDate as 'alterDate' from t_product_info where 1=1 and fProductName=#{name}
